backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing clients, tasks, and user profiles with access control, per-caller storage, and creation/query functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old client records to the new Client format while preserving other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-generated report listing features, associated frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short descriptions summarizing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, root div, and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router, authentication gating, the main layout, and routes for dashboard, clients, and tasks.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and saving the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Displays the public sign‑in screen with branding, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: Provides a dialog to upload, parse, validate, and submit a CSV file for bulk client creation.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Form dialog for creating, editing, or deleting a single client with validation and CRUD hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, user menu, mobile sidebar, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Dialog enabling bulk editing of selected tasks by applying shared field updates using a bulk update hook.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: Dialog component for uploading a CSV to bulk‑create tasks, including file parsing, validation display, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Form dialog for creating, editing, or deleting a single task with extensive field handling and validation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Inline status selector that updates a task’s status via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and bulk‑modifying clients through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on tasks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and lifecycle of the backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for retrieving and saving the current caller’s user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes, applying global borders and base body styles.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Provides deprecated helpers for parsing and encoding client data into a simple object structure for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed client info, loads associated tasks, shows stats, and provides edit and task creation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Lists clients with search, selection, bulk delete, and upload features, plus dialog support for adding clients.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows high-level client and task statistics using data from hooks with a styled dashboard header.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Displays filterable and sortable tasks with bulk operations, creation/edit dialogs, and task status tools.
frontend/src/utils/clientCsv.ts: Implements CSV template generation, download, parsing, validation, and conversion for bulk client uploads.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: Provides CSV template generation, download, and parsing with validation for bulk task uploads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and includes typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requirements, and state version for a task/client management app.
